page.title: 13 AN OUTSIDERS VIEW
page.content: If you blink on a car journey you could be through Middleton Stoney, but if you stop and wander off the main road you will discover an example of what an English village may have been like many years ago.Many of the houses are centuries old and any new houses have had to fit in with the environment. The village is very peaceful and quiet and far removed from the bustle of city life. This village would obviously be attractive to weekenders or people from the city, because of its peace and tranquility and its attractiveness to naturalists.There are numerous local walks available with a wealth of both wildlife and birdlife.
